text:
The i18n mechanism doesn't always work correctly, e.g. this mixed-language admin
tabs were generated:

Users
Groups
IP Ranges
Usecases
Delete
Trash
Server-Status
Sitzungen
Overview
Posteingang
creator: andreas@apache.org
nettings@apache.org
text:
seen that in my custom publication as well.
hard to pin down, changes every once in a while. caching issue?

creator: andreas@apache.org
text:
The i18n is correct when I choose "de" instead of "de_de" in the Firefox
language settings.

creator: andreas@apache.org
text:
Created attachment 21127
Patch for i18n.xmap

The patch removes the <map:otherwise> blocks from the i18n sitemap. Now an
exception is thrown (no pipeline matched request) when the I18nTransformer
tries to resolve the catalogue for "de_de" and the fallback to "de" is
enforced.

creator: andreas@apache.org
text: The patch needs some more testing.
Fixed in revision 595134. I commmitted a slightly modified version of the patch.
creator: andreas@apache.org
